Equipment Actions.Action 1: Rotting Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 14 Bludgeoning plus 21 Necrotic and can curse

Other Actions.Action 1: Multiattack, The Mummy can use its Dreadful Glare and makes one Rotting Fist attack
Other Actions.Action 2: Dreadful Glare, The Mummy glares at a creature and attempts to frighten them

Abilities.Ability 1: Magic Resistance, The Mummy Lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects
Abilities.Ability 2: Rejuvenation, A destroyed Mummy Lord gains a new body after 24 hours if its heart remains intact
Abilities.Ability 3: Spellcasting, The Mummy Lord is a 10th level spellcaster with a lot of Cleric spells prepared

Damage Immunities.Damage 3: Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from nonmagical attacks

Legendary Actions.Action 1: Attack, The Mummy Lord attacks with its Rotting Fist or uses its Dreadful Glare
Legendary Actions.Action 2: Blinding Dust, The Mummy Lord summons dust and sand to swirl around it, blinding nearby creatures
Legendary Actions.Action 3: Blasphemous Word, The Mummy Lord mutters a blasphemous word, stunning any creature that hears it
Legendary Actions.Action 4: Channel Negative Energy, The Mummy Lord magically unleashes a burst of negative energy, blocking all healing
Legendary Actions.Action 5: Whirlwind of Sand, The Mummy Lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves and then reverts to its normal form

Lair Actions.Action 1: The Mummy Lord spreads a mystical energy that pinpoints the location of all living creatures and shares that information will undead creatures
Lair Actions.Action 2: The Mummy Lord spreads a mystical energy that grants all undead advantage on saving throws
Lair Actions.Action 3: The Mummy Lord spreads a mystical energy that causes living creatures unbearable pain when they attempt to cast spells
